post.description: This request creates a new Poll.

get.description: This request returns all the polls.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The satus of the Polls to retrieve (Active, Inactive, Archived)

get.description: The request returns the information for a specified user.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email of the user to retrieve

post.description: The request invite a new user or update the existing user.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email of the Employee to update.

imageDataBase64.description: The employee image data encoded in base64. Maximum size of 3Mb.

post.description: The request creates a new group.

name.description: The group name. The group will be created.

get.description: This request returns the information of a specified group.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The name or id of the group to retrieve.

post.description: This request adds users to a specified group.

emails.description: The user emails. The users will be created if not matched to any existing.

toManagers.description: Add the users to the managers list.

toMembers.description: Add the users to members list.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: The name of the group to retrieve feedback. If null, it retrieves feedback for All Company.

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Filter the feedback with a specific metric, ex : "MG-1". See documentation below.

parameters.name: tone
parameters.description: Filter the feedback with a specific tone, ex : "FP". See documentation below.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter the feedback with a specific type, ex : "POLL". See documentation below.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Filter the feedback with a specific label, ex : "CT-1". See documentation below.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Filter the feedback from a specified creation date. (original feedback)

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Filter the feedback to a specified creation date (original feedback).

post.description:
This request creates a new Feedback.
 WARNING : do not let the user specify his email, enter the email in your back-end.

email.description: The email of the user who created the feedback. WARNING : do not let the user specify his email, enter the email in your back-end.

isAnonymous.description: Specifies if the feedback is anonymous.

get.description: This request returns the information for a specified feedback.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the feedback to retrieve.

post.description: This request removes all users from a specified group.

fromMembers.description: Remove the users from the Members List.

fromManagers.description: Remove the users from the Managers List.

get.description: This request returns the information for a specified poll.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the Poll to retrieve.

items.example: Do you prefer cats or dogs?

post.description: The request returns the engagement reports for a list of dates and groups specified.

groupNames.description: If null, returns the engagement reports for all company users

dates.description: There is a limit of 20 dates.

groupId.description: The name or id of the group to remove.

get.description: The request returns all the groups information of the network.
The request returns the information of all the Users of the network.

post.description: This request removes users from a specified group.

fromMembers.description: Remove the users from the Members List.

fromManagers.description: Remove the users from the Managers List.

post.description: The request will synchronize the company's users, groups and group relations.

inviteNewUsers.description: Whether to invite new users on creation or not

users.description: The list of users to synchronize, cannot be empty

language.description: For language, options are: English, Franais, Espaol, Deutsch, Portugus

Gender.description: Optionally add custom attributes by adding the key value pairs to this object.

groups.description: The list of groups to synchronize, cannot be empty

mappings.description: The list of group hierarchy and their users' memberships, cannot be empty

groupId.description: The ID of the group being mapped

userId.description: The ID of the user being mapped

subGroupId.description: The ID of the group being set as a sub group

isMember.description: If the user is a member of the group or not

isManager.description: If the user is the manager of the group or not

get.description: This request returns a list of the custom labels that can be added to feedbacks.
